attributes.title: Just a Lil Cleanin
attributes.who: No wax, light or moderately soiled
attributes.plus: Door jambs, gas cap, wheels polished, air freshener

attributes.title: Add Some Wax
attributes.who: Light or moderately dirty but needs waxed
attributes.plus: Inside wheel surfaces, emblems, carpet & seat spots, and leather cleaned
attributes.includes: Everything included in 'Just a Lil Cleanin' and hand wax

attributes.title: The Gran Daddy
attributes.who: Heavily soiled or no detail in a while
attributes.plus: Chemical removal of contaminants, carpet, seat spots, and leather
attributes.includes: Everything from 'Add Some Wax', engine bay and clay bar
